posts.text: Hey ! you are in my digital garden : my little place of the internet where i put some ideas, notes, pics and moods. No professionnal ambition here ! only the joy of sharing with no constraint, no goals, that's my garden.
You should make your digital garden too :)
I make this project next the reading of this article which i like particulary. If you know french read it ! I really like the subjects ! serveur410.com/ton-coin-de-web-tattends
I finaly finish the first version of my digital garden, I am quiet happy of it. Sorry for my english I continue to learn ...
